pages.text: Once crafted, the mortar can be placed in the world. Ingredients are added to it by right-clicking them onto it. When a valid recipe is found, the output will be displayed in the HUD.$(br2)Right-clicking with the pestle will grind the ingredients, while right-clicking with an empty hand will remove ingredients.

In addition to the convenience of converting solid objects into a dust or powder form, the mortar is also used to convert reagents into spell powders that can be imbued into a staff.$(br2)Finally, for convenience, you can store a pestle in any empty mortar instead of carrying it around with you.
